Package ca.uqac.lif.textidote.rules

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CheckCaptions
    Checks that captions end with a period.
    CheckCiteMix
    Checks that a document does not mix occurrences of \cite and \citep/\citet.
    CheckFigurePaths
    Checks that included figures are not referenced by an absolute local path.
    CheckFigureReferences
    Checks that every figure with a label is mentioned in the text at least once.
    CheckLanguage
    Checks the text for spelling, grammar and style errors.
    CheckNoBreak
    Checks that text paragraphs do not contain forced line breaks.
    CheckStackedHeadings
    Checks that stacked headings are not present.
    CheckStackedHeadings.CheckStackedHeadingsAdvice
    A placeholder class for a sub-rule checked by CheckStackedHeadings.
    CheckSubsections
    Checks that each sub-division has either 0 or at least 2 subdivisions.
    CheckSubsections.CheckLevelSkip
    A placeholder class for a sub-rule checked by CheckSubsections.
    CheckSubsections.CheckSubsectionOrder
    A placeholder class for a sub-rule checked by CheckSubsections.
    CheckSubsectionSize
    Checks that each sub-division in the text (section, sub-section, etc.) has a minimum number of words.
    LanguageFactory
    Factory class whose sole purpose is to provide instances of Language objects.
    RegexRule
    Rule based on a regular expression pattern to be found in the text.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CheckLanguage.UnsupportedLanguageException
